column5: "You are a man called Uncle Thomas. Today
column6: you went to the Aligre market in the 12th arrondissement of Paris
column7: near your home. You bought some fresh fish
column9: which you put in your freezer to cook later. A few days later
column10: you went on vacation to Honolulu. You spent two wonderful weeks there
column14: it was snowing in Paris. There was even such a snowstorm that electricity was cut off throughout Paris for a week. Far way from all this
column16: you continued to enjoy beautiful days at the beach. Back in Paris
column17: you resume your normal Parisian life. The weekend arrives and you invite a few friends for lunch."
column18: I cook the sea bream and serve it to my friends.
column19: I don't cook the sea bream and instead I serve something else to my friends.
